channel.title: Prayer Tab freezes client. [PI]
channel.description: When ever I click the Prayer Tab it freezes my client, I know this is server sided because I tested my client with the backup source and it worked then when I logged in with my new source it froze. I get no error server sided but I get on client sided. This is it: [code] Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.drawInterface(client.java:8279) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2544) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8178) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8972) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:96) at client.run(client.java:5239) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: Prayer Tab freezes client. [PI]

@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Troubleshoot by making set to either one or the other and see which interface is causing it.

item.title: Prayer Tab freezes client. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

Loveandpower:

make sure that it’s drawing all sprites in the interface.

Like I said its not client sided and I know its not because I tested with two different sources, one source works with this client and the other freezes the client. Both are run by the same client.

Read full topic

make sure that it’s drawing all sprites in the interface.

item.title: Prayer Tab freezes client. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:3, topic:433983”]You have a new Prayer Interface ID so in Client.java under initialize find where the setSideBarInterface is grabbing the old prayer interface and put the new code.

Hint for next time’s null pointer, Null means not found.[/quote]
I did this but the test server that my client prayer tab works with has the same prayer tab id as the server that glitches the client these are both the codes
Non-Working one:

if (altarPrayed == 0) {
				setSidebarInterface(5, 5608);
			} else {
				setSidebarInterface(5, 22500);
			}

Working one:

if(altarPrayed == 0) {
				setSidebarInterface(5, 5608);//prayer 5608
			} else if(altarPrayed == 1) {
				setSidebarInterface(5, 22500);//prayer
			}

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer Tab freezes client. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

You have a new Prayer Interface ID so in Client.java under initialize find where the setSideBarInterface is grabbing the old prayer interface and put the new code.

Hint for next time’s null pointer, Null means not found.

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer Tab freezes client. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

When ever I click the Prayer Tab it freezes my client, I know this is server sided because I tested my client with the backup source and it worked then when I logged in with my new source it froze. I get no error server sided but I get on client sided.
This is it:

Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException
        at client.drawInterface(client.java:8279)
        at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2544)
        at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8178)
        at client.processDrawing(client.java:8972)
        at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:96)
        at client.run(client.java:5239)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
